thread.section_title: Avis marchands de SNCB/NMBS Europe | Avis - SNCB/NMBS Europe | www.b-europe.com
thread.title: James Hatch
thread.title_full: SNCB/NMBS Europe évalué par James Hatch

author: James Hatch
title: James Hatch
text: My only problem, and a big one! is.. what is the difference between these two stations? They are 1/4 mile = 1/3 km apart and I have to carry two suitcases of 23kg = 50 lbs each. What if I made a mistake between the two train stations?? Is TrustPilot going to send somebody to carry my bags for me? Would it kill you to explain the diff?
